forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. High near 15C. Winds S at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. High near 60F. Winds S at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers this evening becoming a steady light rain overnight. Low 9C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers this evening, becoming a steady rain overnight. Low 51F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mix of clouds and sun in the morning will give way to cloudy skies and light rain during the afternoon. High 13C. Winds SW at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy early followed by increasing clouds with showers developing later in the day. High 57F. Winds SW at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Windy at times with rain. Low 11C. Winds SSW at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Windy at times with rain. Low 54F. Winds SSW at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Windy with periods of rain. High 14C. Winds SW at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Windy with rain likely. High 59F. Winds SW at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the evening, then partly cloudy overnight. Low near 10C. Winds W at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy after midnight. Low 51F. Winds W at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Except for a few afternoon clouds, mainly sunny. High 14C. Winds WNW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. High 58F. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. Low 8C. Winds NW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds. Low 49F. Winds WNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday

forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High 59F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night

forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds. Low 49F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Monday

forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High around 60F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Monday Night

forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy in the evening. Increasing clouds with periods of showers after midnight. Low 48F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.
